roleset.name: sag, droop
roleset.note: SAG-V NOTES: Comparison to 'collapse'. Member of Vncls spatial_configuration-47.6. (from sag.01-v)

example.name: stock report
example.text: Aerospace earnings sagged 37% for the quarter and 15% for the year, largely due to lower B-1B program profit; the last of the bombers rolled out in April 1988.
example.arg: 37% for the quarter and 15% for the year
largely due to lower B-1B program profit

example.name: with arg0
example.text: The children looked at each other and sagged their bottoms down even more comfortably than ever .
